column5: I live in South Dakota and have been going to The Pas area in Manitoba in September for years. I am looking for some suggestions for lakes to fish in Southerm Manitoba or Saskatchewan. I haven't been able to get to Canada for about six years and have always wanted to take my son there on a fishing trip. The price of gas is getting to the point that it is the most expensive part of the trip. Any suggestions will be appreciated. :cheers:

Check out Jackson's Lodge. They have a drive in resort and several fly-in lakes. I've been to a few of the fly-ins when they were run by Whiteshell Air Service. The fishing was always awesome! I believe their website is www.jacksonslodge.com. Good luck!
